abstract: After Warren Buffett said would “love” to find a $40 billion acquisition, BusinessWeek has put together its list of possible targets for the Berkshire Hathaway chieftain.
lead_paragraph: After Warren Buffett said would “love” to find a $40 billion acquisition, BusinessWeek has put together its list of possible targets for the Berkshire Hathaway chieftain.

headline.main: A Deal To-Do List for Warren Buffett
